section.name: Commons CLI
section.p: The Jakarta Commons CLI library provides an API for processing command line interfaces. It was formed by the merger of ideas and code from three different libraries - Werken, Avalon and Optz.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: A full User's Guide is available as are various project reports.

section.name: Support
section.p: The commons mailing lists act as the main support forum. The user list is suitable for most library usage queries. The dev list is intended for the development discussion. Please remember that the lists are shared between all commons components, so prefix your email by [cli].
Issues may be reported via the ASF JIRA.
